name: Pistol
text: You may make a Shoot action with this weapon, even if this model is engaged

name: Plasma
text: You may choose to supercharge whenever you make an attack. If you do, then this attack gains AP3 and D2, however if any hit dice rolls a 1 then this model is immediately removed from play.

name: Grunt
text: This model automatically fails all Nerve tests taken when its wounds are reduced below 0. It is always removed from play.
